ItemTooltips.ghost: Death prophet does not need to auto attack so ghost scepter is a great choice against farmed carries.
ItemTooltips.bottle: Death prophet have good rune control with the high movement speed provided by witchcraft. She also benefit highly from many of the runes.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: upgrade your boots to travel for extra movement speed and another slot available as you don't have to carry TPs anymore
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: More movement speed for good rune control. Buy arcane instead if your not doing well in lane
ItemTooltips.vitality_booster: naked vitality booster can be bought for cheap survivability, then later turned into heart.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: If no one else is going for it and you are not having a good enough start get this with arcane boots instead of blood stone
ItemTooltips.pipe: If the enemy team have a lot of magical damage then pipe is a great choice.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Late game hex is always good
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Flat movement speed is very good, as death prophets passive gives a percentage based increase in movement speed. you can also cyclone yourself while your exorcism is active.
ItemTooltips.heart: All you need to do late game in team fights is to stay alive with exorcism on. Heart gives a lot of survivability
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Great against a team with a lot of physical damage, the slow also helps while kiting.
ItemTooltips.bloodstone: Gives everything death prophet needs early game. Mana, survivability and regen.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Go for arcane if you are having a hard time in lane, can be disassembled to make a blood stone later.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: early game stats and movement speed, if you are not having a good start
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: Survivability and mana, good early if your not going for bloodstone, not worth getting as a late game item.

AbilityTooltips.death_prophet_carrion_swarm: Get a few levels early on for lane control, last level does not scale particularly well (50 damage instead of all other levels of 75)
AbilityTooltips.death_prophet_silence: Sometimes silence is needed earlier, this skill point could be swapped with level 3 carrion swarm
AbilityTooltips.death_prophet_witchcraft: Should be maxed early to give your ultimate its maximum effect. Level one exorcism uses 4 spirits, while level 4 witchcraft gives an additional 6 spirits. The movement speed is also very useful for rune control
AbilityTooltips.death_prophet_exorcism: Very good ultimate for pushing and team fights. Remember that the damage is physical and not magical.
